title: Templating
text: Many different source information used put together template packages worth documenting easy review. R packages - covers general R package development precommit - covers general precommit setups r precommit - covers extra r specific precommits pkgdown - building general packages R documentation template package used resources try give example : 1. Automatic production code documention 2. Automatic pre-commit running code checks tests 3. Continuous Integration (CI) / Continuous Deployment (CD) pipelines Github 4. automatically built package website 5. Experiments R package building process 6. Suitable testthat R examples linkages CI / CD 7. Key vignettes showing relevant background information

title: A template used as a basis for developing R packages to my liking
text: basic example shows solve common problem: special using README.Rmd instead just README.md? can include R chunks like : ’ll still need render README.Rmd regularly, keep README.md --date. devtools::build_readme() handy . can also embed plots, example:  case, don’t forget commit push resulting figure files, display GitHub CRAN.
code: library(packTemplate) ## basic example code summary(cars) #>      speed           dist        #>  Min.   : 4.0   Min.   :  2.00   #>  1st Qu.:12.0   1st Qu.: 26.00   #>  Median :15.0   Median : 36.00   #>  Mean   :15.4   Mean   : 42.98   #>  3rd Qu.:19.0   3rd Qu.: 56.00   #>  Max.   :25.0   Max.   :120.00
